member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.UpdateProductTags(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds or removes assigments to product tags.
member.remarks: Tags that are not included in **tagNames** are added and assigned to the product. Existing assignments to tags that are not included in **tagNames** are removed.
member.param: List of tag names to apply.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.ApplyDiscounts(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Adds or removes discounts assigments.
member.remarks: Identifiers of discounts that are not included in **discountIds** are assigned to the product. Existing assignments to discounts that are not included in **discountIds** are removed.
member.param: List of discount identifiers to apply.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.CalculatePrice(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates a product price.
member.param: A value indicating whether to calculate the price for a product list. Speeds up the calculation if true, since lowest and presselected price are not calculated.
The product quantity. 1 by default.
The identifier of a customer to calculate the price for. Obtained from IWorkContext.CurrentCustomer if 0.
The target currency to use for money conversion. Obtained from IWorkContext.WorkingCurrency if 0.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.CreateAttributeCombinations(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates all variant attributes combinations for a product. Already existing combinations will be deleted before.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.ManageAttributes(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Manages\synchronizes the attributes and attribute values of a product.
member.param: The attributes and attribute values to be processed.

If set to false, only missing attributes and attribute values are inserted. If set to true, existing records are also updated and values not included in the request body are removed from the database. This means that if no attribute values are sent, then the attribute is removed along with all values for this product.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.SaveFiles(System.Int32,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFileCollection,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Saves files like images and assigns them to a product.
member.param: Identifier of the product to which the images should be assigned. 0 if the product is to be identified by SKU, GTIN or MPN.
The files to be saved.
SKU (stock keeping unit) of the product to which the images should be assigned.
GTIN (global trade item number) of the product to which the images should be assigned.
MPN (manufacturer part number) of the product to which the images should be assigned.
member.remarks:
It does not matter if one of the uploaded images already exists. The Web API automatically ensures that a product has no duplicate images by comparing both binary data streams.
It is also possible to update/replace an existing image. To do so simply add the file identifier as **fileId** attribute in the content disposition header of the file.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.Search(Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel)
member.summary: Searches for products.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.RecycleBin
member.summary: Gets the soft-deleted products of the recycle bin.
member.remarks: Can only be used in conjunction with the methods **Restore** and **DeletePermanent** because soft-deleted products are excluded from other endpoints.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.DeletePermanent(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Permanently deletes soft-deleted products.
member.param: Identifiers of products to be permanently deleted. Use an empty list to delete all soft-deleted products (empty recycle bin).

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ProductsController.Restore(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Restores soft-deleted products.
member.param: Identifiers of products to restore.
A value indicating whether to publish restored products.

member.summary: Adds a shipment to an order.

Tracking number if any.
Tracking URL if any.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ShoppingCartItemsController.AddToCart(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Smartstore.Core.Checkout.Cart.ShoppingCartType,System.Int32,Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData)
member.summary: Adds a product to cart or wishlist.
member.remarks: Returns the cart or the wishlist items of the customer depending on the value of the **shoppingCartType** parameter.
member.param: Identifier of the customer who owns the cart.
Identifier of the product to add.
The quantity to add.
**1** to add item to the shopping cart. **2** to add to wishlist.
Identifier of the store the cart item belongs to. If **0**, then the current store is used.
Optional extra data to apply, e.g. product attributes.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ShoppingCartItemsController.UpdateItem(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Updates a shopping cart item.
member.param: The quantity to set.
A value indicating whether to enable or disable the cart item.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ShoppingCartItemsController.DeleteItem(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes a shopping cart item.
member.param: A value indicating whether to reset checkout data of the customer to whom the cart item belongs. For example selected payment and shipping method.
A value indicating whether to remove checkout attributes that require shipping, if the cart does not require shipping at all.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Controllers.ShoppingCartItemsController.DeleteCart(System.Int32,Smartstore.Core.Checkout.Cart.ShoppingCartType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the shopping cart of a Customer. Returns the number of deleted shopping cart items.
member.param: Identifier of the customer who owns the cart.
A value indicating whether to delete the shopping cart or the wishlist.
Identifier to filter cart items by store. 0 to delete all items.
member.response: Number of deleted shopping cart items.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice
member.summary: Represents the result of a price calculation process for a single product.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.ProductId
member.summary: The identifier of the product for which a price was calculated.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.CurrencyId
member.summary: The identifier of the currency into which the prices were converted.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.CurrencyCode
member.summary: The ISO code of the currency into which the prices were converted.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.FinalPrice
member.summary: The final price of the product.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.RegularPrice
member.summary: The regular unit price of the product. Usually Product.Price, Product.ComparePrice or Product.SpecialPrice.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.RetailPrice
member.summary: The retail unit price (MSRP) of the product. A retail price is given Product.ComparePrice is not 0 and Product.ComparePriceLabelId referes to an MSRP label.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.OfferPrice
member.summary: The special offer price, if any (see Product.SpecialPrice).

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.ValidUntilUtc
member.summary: The date until is valid.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.PreselectedPrice
member.summary: The price that is initially displayed on the product detail page, if any. Includes price adjustments of preselected attributes and prices of attribute combinations.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.LowestPrice
member.summary: The lowest possible price of a product, if any. Includes prices of attribute combinations and tier prices. Ignores price adjustments of attributes.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.DiscountAmount
member.summary: The discount amount applied to FinalPrice.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.Saving
member.summary: A price saving in relation to FinalPrice. The saving results from the applied discounts, if any, otherwise from the difference to the Product.ComparePrice.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.ProductPriceSaving.HasSaving
member.summary: A value indicating whether there is a price saving on the calculated final price.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.ProductPriceSaving.SavingPrice
member.summary: The price that represents the saving. Often displayed as a crossed-out price. Always greater than the final price if HasSaving is true.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.ProductPriceSaving.SavingPercent
member.summary: The saving, in percent, compared to the final price.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CalculatedProductPrice.ProductPriceSaving.SavingAmount
member.summary: The saving, as money amount, compared to the final price.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel
member.summary: Represents query parameters for a catalog search.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.Term
member.summary: The search term.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.PageIndex
member.summary: The page index, starting from 1. **$skip** is ignored. Example: 1.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.PageSize
member.summary: The page size. **$top** is ignored. Example: 100.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.OrderBy
member.summary: Product sorting. **$orderby** is ignored.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.CategoryIds
member.summary: Comma separated list of category identifiers. Example: **2,3**.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.ManufacturerIds
member.summary: Comma separated list of manufacturer identifiers. Example: **5**.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.DeliveryTimeIds
member.summary: Comma separated list of delivery time identifiers. Example: **8,9**.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.PriceRange
member.summary: Price range (from~to or from(~) or ~to). Example: **100~150**.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.Rating
member.summary: Minimum rating. Example: **2**.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.Availability
member.summary: Availability. Example: **true**.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.CatalogSearchQueryModel.NewArrivals
member.summary: New arrivals. Example: **true**.

member.summary: The name of the product attribute.

member.summary: A value indicating whether the attribute is required (mandatory to be selected).

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.CustomData
member.summary: Any custom data. It's not used by Smartstore but is being passed to the choice partial view.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.Values
member.summary: A list of attribute values.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.ManageProductAttributeValue.Name
member.summary: The name of of the attribute value.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.ManageProductAttributeValue.Alias
member.summary: The SEO friendly search alias.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.ManageProductAttributeValue.Color
member.summary: The color RGB value (used with "Boxes" attribute type).

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.ManageProductAttributeValue.PriceAdjustment
member.summary: A price adjustment\surcharge.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.ManageProductAttributeValue.WeightAdjustment
member.summary: A weight adjustment.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Catalog.ManagedProductAttribute.ManageProductAttributeValue.IsPreSelected
member.summary: A value indicating whether the value is preselected.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData
member.summary: Represents optional extra data when adding an item to shopping cart or wishlist.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.Attributes
member.summary:
Product attributes to apply. Requires product variant identifiers to specify. Alternatively, if you do not know the identifiers, then you can use **searchAttributes**.
Use **attributes** or **searchAttributes**, but not both together. Both do the same thing (applying attributes), just in different ways.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.SearchAttributes
member.summary:
Searches for attributes associated with the product and applies them. Simple attributes such as **color** or **size** can be specified more easily this way than via **attributes**.
Use **attributes** or **searchAttributes**, but not both together. Both do the same thing (applying attributes), just in different ways.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.CheckoutAttributes
member.summary:
Checkout attributes to apply. Requires checkout attribute identifiers to specify. Alternatively, if you do not know the identifiers, then you can use **searchCheckoutAttributes**.
Use **checkoutAttributes** or **searchCheckoutAttributes**, but not both together. Both do the same thing (applying checkout attributes), just in different ways.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.SearchCheckoutAttributes
member.summary:
Searches for checkout attributes and applies them.
Use **checkoutAttributes** or **searchCheckoutAttributes**, but not both together. Both do the same thing (applying checkout attributes), just in different ways.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.GiftCard
member.summary: Gift card properties to apply. Only applicable if the product is a gift card.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.CustomerEnteredPrice
member.summary: A price entered by customer. Only applicable if the product supports it.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.AddToCartPrice
member.summary: Represents a price entered by customer.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.AddToCartPrice.Price
member.summary: Customer entered price. Only applicable if the product supports it.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.AddToCartPrice.CurrencyCode
member.summary: Currency code for **price**. If empty, then **price** must be in the primary currency of the store.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.SearchAttribute
member.summary: Represents a product or checkout attribute to search for.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.SearchAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of the attribute.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Models.Checkout.AddToCartExtraData.SearchAttribute.Value
member.summary: The value of the attribute.

member.summary: Gets the product variant SKU if a product variant was ordered, otherwise the product SKU.

member.summary: Gets the slug of the product URL.

member.summary: Gets the product URL.

member.summary: The thumbnail URL of the product image. The current host name is prepended if is enabled.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.AccessDeniedReason
member.summary: Represents the reason for denying an API request.

member.name: F:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.AccessDeniedReason.ApiDisabled
member.summary: The API is disabled.

member.name: F:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.AccessDeniedReason.SslRequired
member.summary: HTTPS is required in any case unless the request takes place in a development environment.

member.name: F:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.AccessDeniedReason.InvalidAuthorizationHeader
member.summary: The HTTP authorization header is missing or invalid. Must have the format 'PublicKey:SecretKey'.

member.name: F:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.AccessDeniedReason.InvalidCredentials
member.summary: The credentials sent by the HTTP authorization header do not match those of the user.

member.name: F:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.AccessDeniedReason.UserUnknown
member.summary: The user is unknown.

member.name: F:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.AccessDeniedReason.UserDisabled
member.summary: The user is known but his access via the API is disabled.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.BasicAuthenticationHandler
member.summary: Verifies the identity of a user using basic authentication. Also ensures that requests are sent via HTTPS (except in a development environment).

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.BasicAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Contains the options used by .

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.BasicAuthenticationOptions.SuppressWWWAuthenticateHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the WWW-Authenticate header will be suppressed on unauthorized responses.
member.remarks: "WWW-Authenticate" header causes the browser to prompt for credentials. If it is missing the server just sends 401 status code.

member.name: P:Smartstore.Web.Api.Security.BasicAuthenticationOptions.SslRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether SSL is required. False is unsafe and should only be used with caution.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.OpenApiUtility.InvalidOperationIdCharsRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[{}\\$]
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.Singleline
Explanation:
Match a character in the set [${}].

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.OpenApiUtility.GetDocumentName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a humanized name for one of the names of .

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.OpenApiUtility.GetOperationId(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Gets a unique and valid OpenAPI Operation-ID. By default is used but it is not unique. Some OpenAPI validators expect URL friendly characters.
member.remarks: Also prevents multiple descriptions from expanding at the same time when clicking a method in Swagger UI.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.OpenApiUtility.GetSchemaId(System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a unique OpenAPI schema ID for an object type. Avoids "Conflicting schemaIds" (multiple types with the same name but different namespaces).

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerDocumentFilter
member.summary: Removes Open API paths and schemas that should not be displayed in the Swagger documentation.
member.remarks: It would be nice if we could strip off the OData route here: /odata/v1/categories({key}) -> /categories({key}) but that would let Swagger execute against /categories({key}) always resulting in 404 NotFound. To achieve this a custom Swagger template would be required. Perhaps there is an extension somewhere.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerDocumentFilter.PathsToIgnoreRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[a-z0-9\\/](\\$count|\\{key\\}|default\\.)
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.Singleline
Explanation:

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerDocumentFilter.FilterSchemas(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.DocumentFilterContext)
member.summary: Removes unexpected, unwanted schemas.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerDocumentFilter.FilterPaths(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiDocument)
member.summary: Removes duplicate and unusual, unexpected documents.

member.name: T:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter
member.summary: Adds information to like describing objects for repeating methods in OData controllers (like Get, Post, Put, Patch, Delete etc.). Fixes lots of Swashbuckle bugs. Only takes into account OData controllers that inherit from SmartODataController.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter.AddOperationInfo(Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationHelper)
member.summary: Adds info to known OData methods.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter.AddParameterInfo(Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationHelper)
member.summary: Adds extra info to known parameters.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter.AddQueryParameters(Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationHelper)
member.summary: Adds OData query parameters.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter.FixOdataActions(Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationHelper)
member.summary: Adds missing request body. Removes parameters for FromODataBodyAttribute that are falsely offered as query parameters.
member.remarks: This is a workaround that will probably become obsolete in future Swashbuckle versions when OData is fully supported.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter.FixOdataFunctions(Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationHelper)
member.summary: Fixes wrong identifier arrays in OData URL path.
member.remarks: This is a workaround that will probably become obsolete in future Swashbuckle versions when OData is fully supported.

member.name: M:Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter.RemoveParameters(Smartstore.Web.Api.Swagger.SwaggerOperationHelper)
member.summary: Removes unwanted parameters.
